description: Format for the assignment specification json for reference repositories.
title: Assignment Spec schema.

___testables.description: A list of logical test groups with common build outputs
___testables.title: Testables schema.

items.description: A group of test cases sharing a common build command
items.title: Testable schema.

___build_command.description: A unix command that compiles/builds the project
___build_command.title: Build Command schema.

items.description: An individual test case worth some amount of points
items.title: Test Case schema.

___hide_expected.description: Whether to hide the expected output from students when they fail this test case
___hide_expected.title: Hide Expected schema.

___points.description: Point value for this test case
___points.title: Points schema.

___expected.description: The path to the solution output, or 'generate' to have it generated
___expected.title: Expected schema.

___timeout.description: How long (in seconds) to let student code run
___timeout.title: Timeout schema.

___command.description: A unix command to inspect output on
___command.title: Command schema.

___kind.description: What kind of test case this is
___kind.title: Kind schema.

___diff_source.description: The file that contains test output for diff-ing
___diff_source.title: Diff Source schema.

___expected_files.description: Minimum files expected from student submissions
___expected_files.title: Expected Files schema

items.description: Ant-style path to a file or filename pattern, such as **/*.h or resources/foo.c
items.title: Expected File schema.

___ready.description: Whether this assignment is ready for students to start or not.
___ready.title: Ready schema

___maximum_group_size.description: If students are allowed to work in groups, enter the max group size, otherwise enter 1.
___maximum_group_size.title: Maximum Group Size schema

___assignment_name.description: The identifier for this assignment in your course
___assignment_name.title: Assignment Name schema

___deadline.description: The due date for the assignment
___deadline.title: Deadline schema

___uneditables.description: Files that, when changed, revert to the given default
___uneditables.title: Uneditables schema

items.description: Ant-style path to a file or filename pattern, such as **/*.h or resources/foo.c
items.title: Uneditable File schema.
